concept.title: Region Shortcuts
concept.shortdesc: This topic describes the various region shortcuts you can use to configure regions.

section.p: Region shortcuts are groupings of pre-configured attributes that define the characteristics of a region. You can use a region shortcut as a starting point when configuring regions and you can add additional configurations to customize your application.
